ArgonTest.Name: Option
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
proc printOpt (opt: Option String): () = puts (opt.getOrElse(_ => 'Empty!'))
proc main(): () do printOpt (Some String 'Hello World!!!') printOpt (None String) end

namespace Ar
public sealed trait Option(T: type) <: Object
public abstract def _.map(U: type)(f1: T -> U): Option U public abstract def _.getOrElse(f2: () -> T): T
end
public constructor Some(T1: type)(value: T1): Option T1
public override def _.map(U: type)(f3: T1 -> U): Option U = Some U (f3 value)
public override def _.getOrElse(f4: () -> T1): T1 = value
end
public constructor None(T2: type): Option T2
public override def _.map(U: type)(f5: T2 -> U): Option U = None U
public override def _.getOrElse(f6: () -> T2): T2 = f6()
end
